alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 7:47AM CDT until July 13 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Milford. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, significant amounts of pasture and other farm lands begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 AM CDT Sunday was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue falling to 10.6 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 AM CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Little Sioux River Milford 12.0 14.2 Sun 6 AM 13.5 12.7 11.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
